item.description:
Last meeting we were all inspired to write down goals that we intended to focus on this month.  We'll watch more of Louise Hay on the 20th and for those who weren't there you may be inspired to set some intentions too! Always a positive and uplifting time... 

 

There will be a small donation of $3-$5 to help offset the price to run this :)
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting at the same place in Scarborough. Will send if you're new.
item.name: Let's see what the rest of Louise Hay's movie has to offer?
